lead_paragraph: TAFT--Adrienne Wilkins, passed away on March 28, 2016 at the age of 82. Beloved mother of Stephen (Jessica), Rodney (Victoria) and Margot (Simon). Adoring grandmother of Justin, Jeffrey, Dylan, Adam, Joseph and Corey. Services Wednesday, March 30, 9:30am at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TAFT, ADRIENNE WILKINS
